Theo Brenner-Roach

Theo is a Personal Trainer, Kickboxing Instructor and Fitness Blogger.

Can you tell us a little about yourself?

I've always loved exercise, I spent my childhood swimming, running cross country and playing football. Come my teenage years I found the gym and kickboxing, going on to compete nationally for a period. Having decided the competing game wasn't for me you can mostly find me working out, playing 5-a-side football or practising my moves. Currently I'm a fitness and body confidence blogger, kickboxing instructor and qualified personal trainer.

What does your workout routine look like?

I strength train 3-4 times a week for about an 45-60 mins each session. I use either a 2 or 3 day split depending on what else I have going on and focus on heavy compound lifts for moderate reps. I get my cardio by playing football, kickboxing and going walking.

Which products have had the most significant impact on your fitness journey?

My top 2 products at the moment are my food scales and the MyFitnessPal app, these two tools help keep my nutrition in check and on track.

Etekcity Digital Multifunction Food Kitchen Scale

Weigh up to 11lb (5kg)

Nutrition

What are your goals for the future?

Moving forwards I want to continue to grow my blog and share all the knowledge I've collected along the way. I hope to inspire others to make positive changes in their lives and begin to address the wider issue of male body confidence.

Where can we go to follow your fitness journey?

Website | Facebook | Twitter | Instagram
